content: I appreciate the resources and tips! I was particularly interested in the part about making the world relatable. I've been trying to draw inspiration from my own experiences, like attending a book reading event at my local library where author Sarah Taylor discussed her latest novel, "The Lost City". I was impressed by her insights on character development and how she drew inspiration from her own travels. I'm wondering if you could give me some advice on how to incorporate my own experiences into my writing, especially when it comes to world-building.
